ProductInfo.Features:
GW7204C: Professional 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. 4CH WD1 Recroding + 4 CH WD1 Playback. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW623C: 1/3" CMOS Outdoor Camera, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65 ft IR Distance. Low Illumination 0.1 Lux. Metal vandal proof & water proof
GW736W: 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 560 TV lines, InfraRed LED 24 Pcs. 3.6mm Len for Wide Angle View. Low 0 Lux Minimum Illumination. Metal vandal proof & water proof
Package Includes:     GW7204C DVR with 500GB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     1 x GW623C - 1/3" CMOS Camera;     1 x GW736W - 1/3" SONY CCD Camera;
1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC;     1 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC;     2 x GW12V0.5A: 12V0.5A Power Supply for Security Cameras.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 2CHP1 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 2 x Water Proof Security Camera, Free Monitor, iPhone Android viewable (White/Black)
